atlantis.engine.graphics

Class SpriteAnimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • atlantis.engine.graphics.SpriteAnimator

  • public class SpriteAnimator
extends java.lang.Object
    A sprite animator that work with a collection of source rectangle to display the correct animation.
    Author:
    Yannick
